text: James O'Heir (born February 4, 1962) is an American actor and Emmy Award winner who is best known for co-starring as Jerry Gergich on the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation from 2009 to 2015. == Career == He is known for his roles in the movies: Smothered by Mothers (2019) and Seeking a Friend for the End of the World (2012). == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:Living people
title: Jim O'Heir
